name: Runner (itch) (DarxDev)
description:
WASD - Move

Space - jump

Space (Hold) - Wall run

Space (release) - Wall jump

Shift (hold )- Slow Motion

Left mouse button - Shoot

Get to the finish as fast as possible without dying, you can shoot the targets to unlock corresponding doors, and you can shoot lasers to disable them. shooting a laser gives 100 points, shooting a target gives 150 points. at the end you will receive your overall score and rank.

fill out the survey here : https://forms.gle/4SDkvP8GcPAD9Z5AA
